item.title: Israel’s Attack on Qatari Soil Leads Gulf Powers to Question U.S. Protection
item.description: The audacious attempt to kill the political leaders of Hamas in Doha could upend the foundations of an American-led order in the Middle East.

item.title: Poland Says It Shot Down Russian Drones That Entered Its Airspace
item.description: The Polish military called the incursions an “act of aggression.” Poland and NATO air forces launched warplanes to respond, the Polish military said.

item.title: Hong Kong’s Same-Sex Rights Bill Meets Rare Defiance From Lawmakers

item.title: How Gen Z Protests Overturned a Government, and a Crackdown on TV Drug Ads
Inside Jeffrey Epstein’s 50th Birthday Book
item.description: A Times investigation looked into how the disgraced financier leveraged his rich and powerful friends.
